text: Eddie and the Cruisers is a 1983 American musical drama movie directed by Martin Davidson and was based on the novel by P. F. Kluge. It stars Tom Berenger, Michael Par√©, Joe Pantoliano, Matthew Laurance, Helen Schneider, Ellen Barkin and was distributed by Embassy Pictures. It was followed up by Eddie and the Cruisers II: Eddie Lives! in 1989. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1983 musical movies Category:1983 drama movies Category:American musical movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Martin Davidson Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Movies set in New Jersey
title: Eddie and the Cruisers
